project

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    This class store all the map information of the whole process, including all the city, distribution center and distance between each cities, it mainly used for generating the cost-efficient route for delivery product from distribution to each city.
    Author:
    group

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(int max)
      Constructor:Create a instance of a Map

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCity(java.lang.String city)
      This method add a city into cities List if it is not already in in the cities List; If already exist, do nothing;
      boolean addDC(java.lang.String dc)
      This method add a distribution center into the list of DCS, if the dc is not yet in the cities List, add it.
      void addFRs(java.lang.String cityA, java.lang.String cityB, int dist)
      This method add two city into the cities list if it is not in the list, then reset the distance between these two city to the given distance.
      int PathDistance(java.util.List<java.lang.String> path)
      This method used to calculate the distance of the given path
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ShortestRoute(java.lang.String cityA)
      This method use Dijkstra algorithm to find the shortestRoute(cheapest) from the nearby distribution center to that city : if CityA can't reach the distribution center anyway, return an empty ArrayList; if cityA itself is a distribution center, return an ArrayList contains only cityA;else return the path to the nearest Distribution;

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Map

        public Map(int max)
        Constructor:Create a instance of a Map
        Parameters:
        max - the max size of the grid

    • Method Detail

      • addCity

        public void addCity(java.lang.String city)
        This method add a city into cities List if it is not already in in the cities List; If already exist, do nothing;
        Parameters:
        city - The name of the city to be added

      • addDC

        public boolean addDC(java.lang.String dc)
        This method add a distribution center into the list of DCS, if the dc is not yet in the cities List, add it.
        Parameters:
        dc - the name of the distribution center
        Returns:
        boolean true if distribution center is successfully added, false otherwise

      • addFRs

        public void addFRs(java.lang.String cityA,
                   java.lang.String cityB,
                   int dist)
        This method add two city into the cities list if it is not in the list, then reset the distance between these two city to the given distance.
        Parameters:
        cityA - the name of the first city
        cityB - the name of the second city
        dist - the distance between cityA and cityB

      • ShortestRoute

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ShortestRoute(java.lang.String cityA)
        This method use Dijkstra algorithm to find the shortestRoute(cheapest) from the nearby distribution center to that city : if CityA can't reach the distribution center anyway, return an empty ArrayList; if cityA itself is a distribution center, return an ArrayList contains only cityA;else return the path to the nearest Distribution;
        Parameters:
        cityA - the name of this city
        Returns:
        a arrayList of string which contain the shortestRoute,a empty arrayList is returned if no route find

      • PathDistance

        public int PathDistance(java.util.List<java.lang.String> path)
        This method used to calculate the distance of the given path
        Parameters:
        path - a list of string that form a path
        Returns:
        int the distance of the given path
